refsect1.programlisting:
<CsoundSynthesizer> <CsOptions> ; Select audio/midi flags here according to platform ; Audio out Audio in -odac -iadc ;;;RT audio I/O ; For Non-realtime ouput leave only the line below: ; -o gen16.wav -W ;;; for file output any platform </CsOptions> <CsInstruments>
sr = 44100 ksmps = 128 nchnls = 1
instr 1 kcps init 1/p3 kndx phasor kcps
ifn = p4 ixmode = 1 kval table kndx, ifn, ixmode
ibasefreq = 440 kfreq = kval * ibasefreq a1 oscil 20000, ibasefreq + kfreq, 1 out a1 endin
</CsInstruments> <CsScore>
f 1 0 16384 10 1
f 2 0 1024 16 1 1024 1 0 f 3 0 1024 16 1 1024 2 0 f 4 0 1024 16 1 1024 10 0 f 5 0 1024 16 1 1024 -1 0 f 6 0 1024 16 1 1024 -2 0 f 7 0 1024 16 1 1024 -10 0
i 1 0 2 2 i 1 + . 3 i 1 + . 4 i 1 + . 5 i 1 + . 6 i 1 + . 7
e
</CsScore> </CsoundSynthesizer>
